I would like to make animated solar panels, how do I make the animation and how do I Implement that into ksp, Thanks to anyone who can help

 

GK7

I've put together a number of projects for various parts here. Includes the Blender, Unity projects and the final in-game part. One on the solar panels should be retractable (animated). For the animation I would suggest looking up some youtube tutorials on animation. One thing that really helps in animating parts that rotate (like the panels on a solar array) is to set the origin of the part to the hinge. Another thing to note is that (last time I checked anyway) at least one of the Blender exporters didn't export rotations based on Euler angles (the Collada one I believe).
